Early Edition is an American television drama series that aired on CBS broadcast network from September 28, 1996 to May 27, 2000.

Triplets:<Early Edition
1:
--------------------
Text: Early Edition:  Set in the city of Chicago, Illinois, it follows the adventures of a man who mysteriously receives each "Chicago Sun-Times" newspaper the day before it is actually published, and who uses this knowledge to prevent terrible events every day.
Triplets:<Early Edition
3:
--------------------
Text: Early Edition:  Despite fan efforts to save the show, it was cancelled in May 2000, and it began airing in syndication on Fox Family Channel that same month.
